Package net.minestom.server.chat

Class ColoredText

java.lang.Object
net.minestom.server.chat.JsonMessage
net.minestom.server.chat.ColoredText
public class ColoredText
extends JsonMessage
Represents a text with one or multiple colors.

Used when the message can contain colors but not events like in RichMessage.

To create one, you simply call one of the static methods like of(ChatColor, String), you can then continue to append text with append(ChatColor, String).

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class net.minestom.server.chat.JsonMessage
